snippet: Two young girls accused of stabbing their classmate to please the horror character Slender Man must stand trial as adults for attempted homicide, a judge ruled Friday.
abstract: Judge Michael Bohren rules that two young girls accused of stabbing their Wisconsin classmate Payton Leutner 19 time to please horror character Slender Man must stand trial as adults for attempted homicide.
lead_paragraph: Two young girls accused of stabbing their classmate to please the horror character Slender Man must stand trial as adults for attempted homicide, a judge ruled Friday.

headline.main: Wisconsin: ‘Slender Man’ Case Sent to Adult Court
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Midwest; Wisconsin: ‘Slender Man’ Case Sent to Adult Court
